item.title: The Brave Browser, should you use it?
item.description: Brave is a popular chromium based browser made by Brendan Eich (co-founder of Firefox) that is open source. Brave comes built-in with an ad blocker, and because of that, it’s faster than Chrome. Many people like it, but should you use it? That is the question i will try to answer. Good stuff Brave blocks ads, and upgrades your connection to HTTPS when it can. This makes it better than typical browsers such as Chrome for privacy.
